bug.author: akrolsmir
bug.summary: st.balloons should not take up layout space
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Possibly a regression from the recent st.balloons upgrade? Or maybe was always the case. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>st.header("Results") if st.button("Press me!"): st.balloons() st.header("hm") </denchmark-code>
Click on the button. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
No space inserted after clicking on the button. (E.g. st.empty() would not take up space there) Probably just need to mark the st.balloons react element with whatever we're using on st.empty, so that it is completely hidden <denchmark-h:h2>Saw:</denchmark-h>
"hm" header shifted down.
